notes.text: sap.m.Menu, sap.ui.unified.Menu: added defaultClass to the items aggregation
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fix SR announcements when all-day appointments are selected with keyboard.
sap.m.Menu, sap.ui.unified.Menu: add menu item selection functionality
sap.m.TimePicker: add value state message to mobile numeric picker
sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fix SR announcements when appointments are selected with keyboard.
sap.m.Toolbar: Prevent unnecessary scroll
sap.m.ObjectNumber: remove roledescription announcement
sap.m.DatePicker, sap.m.DateTimePicker, sap.m.DateRangeSelection: add picker accessible name
sap.m.SelectDialog,TableSelectDialog: Set focus to the initially focusable element after selection is reset
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarGrid: Prevent appointment selection by pressing the Tab key
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: propagate row selection to table
We've made the subheader dynamic in the NewsContent when it is in a stretch tile
sap.m.TimePicker: Provide additional testing control instance for the visual test
sap.m.Toolbar: Remove warning message when using sap.ui.core.HTML
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Change of library dependency to layout
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarGrid: Prevent appointment selection by pressing the Tab key
sap.m.Column: add missing check for parent Table in _onLabelPropertyChange
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Fix title / text alignment of inverted status
sap.m.ObjectNumber: align test page example
Fiori20Adapter: Strengthened the check for the navigation back button
sap.m.Dialog: Dragging is no longer interrupted by selection at the same time
sap.m Input: new 'fromKeyboard' parameter is now added to the valueHelpRequest event
sap.m.Dialog: Custom footer can be reached with Shift+Tab
sap.m.Table: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
sap.ui.unified.CalendarRow: Appointments ARIA texts are correctly translated and localized now
We've now updated the event parameters for the status and readystate document types in the Uploadcompleted event of Uploadset control
sap.m.Carousel: fixed accessing inner controls with tab
sap.m.DynamicDateRange: add group type "Data" to value property
sap.m.DynamicDateRange: Last and Next options title is now correctly retrieved
sap.m.Carousel: fix page disappearing when scrolling
sap.m.Select: Arrow navigation issue fixed
sap.m.Popover: close the popover if the opener is not visible
GenericTile overlap happening when sap.m.TileSizeBehavior.Small is used.
sap.m.RatingIndicator: Icons visual issue fixed
sap.m.Page: Show footer after calling setShowFooter twice
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarGrid: update appointment styling
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: improve screen reader announcements
sap.m.IconTabBar: Content padding classes are applied to the header if additional class is present
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: fixed "select all" checkbox positioning
sap.m.Page: Fix failing tests
